resources.string: Delivery charge varies with each product. Mostly we provide FREE delivery in India. Some items may have a shipping cost depending on the nature of the product. For International orders, the shipping charges are different for different items and are mentioned clearly on the product page. Also Prices may be different for different countries to account for shipping costs and prices listed in INR are only for India.
2) What is the estimated delivery time?
The estimated time of delivery is within 7 working days for domestic orders and 21 working days for international orders. All orders get shipped within 5 days from our warehouse.
3) How will the delivery be done?

We try to process all deliveries through reputed courier companies like Bluedart, Aramex, DTDC, DHL, and Fedex. In some cases, where the pin/zipcode is not serviceable by these courier companies, we use Indian Speed Post for those deliveries. If there is no courier service available in your area, we will get in touch with you and try to work out a convenient alternate delivery location that is serviced by our courier partners.

Yes, we do deliver items internationally. You are more than welcome to make your purchases on our site from anywhere in the world. We use DHL, DTDC, India Post, or FEDEX to deliver your shipments safely and timely to you.
5) How can I track the delivery of my order?
All items are delivered through reputed courier partners who will provide a Tracking ID for your order. We also email you the tracking details after we dispatch your order.
6) Why is the COD option not offered in my location?

Availability of Cash on Delivery depends on the ability of our courier partner servicing your location to accept cash as payment at the time of delivery. Our courier partners have limits on the cash amount payable on delivery depending on the destination, and your order value might have exceeded this limit. Please enter your pin code on the product page to check if COD is available in your location.
It means that currently, the item is not available for sale.
All items are carefully packaged as to avoid any form of damage.
9) Who would be responsible for paying local taxes in countries outside of India?
Customs Duty & other international taxes etc. if applicable will have to be borne by the customer according to the laws of the land.
1) What is Global Fashion Return Policy?

Our "100% Buyer Protection Program" allows for easy returns and refunds for: Products which you may not like for quality, color or design related issues Products which you received in "Damaged/Defective/Broken" condition Products not as per description/photo on the website All products must be returned in their original condition along with the bills and labels. Please follow the below given steps to register your dispute within 3 days of receipt of the product. Disputes registered after 3 days of delivery may not be entertained by us.
2) How to raise dispute for an order?

You can raise a dispute within 3 days of delivery: By sending an email to support@amrozia.in with images of broken/defective/damaged products within 3 days of delivery. Please mention your order number in the email. (We need photos of the products received so that we can defend your dispute). Please add Bank Details in case of Cash On Delivery Order. Please mention Reason for Return.
3) What happens after a dispute is raised?

After we review your return request, you will receive an email containing the instructions and return shipping address to which you need to send back the product within 10 days. We recommend using an online traceable courier service for returning your items.
4) Who pays for the delivery charges for returning of products?
Buyer has to bear the return delivery charges. We will reimburse you the delivery charges only if the product received by you was in "Damaged/Defective/Broken" condition.
Items falling under following categories CANNOT be returned: Custom stitched products Inner wear All types of Accessories - Earrings, Necklace, Pendants

Rayon is a versatile fiber with comfort properties similar to natural fibers. It can imitate the feel and texture of silk, wool, cotton, and linen. Rayon fabrics are soft, smooth, cool, comfortable, and highly absorbent, making them ideal for use in hot and humid climates.

Rayon is made from wood, treated with caustic soda to form cellulose, which is then converted into a viscose solution. This solution is spun into filaments and solidified to form regenerated cellulose.
1. Hand wash rayon clothes with a mild detergent in cold water. Rayon is weak when wet and less durable than cotton.
2. Machine wash rayon blends on the delicate setting, but be cautious as it may damage the fabric.
3. Always read the label for specific washing instructions. If it says dry clean only, avoid washing at home to prevent damage or shrinkage.
4. Avoid hanging rayon clothes to dry as they can lose their shape. Use line drying or flat drying methods instead.

Ajrak, also known as Ajrakh, is a unique form of block printing found in Ajrakhpur, Kutch district, India. These shawls display special designs and patterns made using block printing by stamps. Ajrak prints are a symbol of Sindhi culture and traditions, and are also popular in Gujarat due to their historical roots in the Indus Valley Civilization.

Early human settlements in the lower Indus Valley used tree cotton to make clothes and mastered the art of making cotton fabrics. Ajrak is a symbol of pride and respect for Sindhi people and is used to honor guests. The geometric designs are created using woodblock printing.
Ajrak products are made with natural dyes, including both vegetable and mineral dyes. Indigo is a key dye used in the production process.

Common Ajrak patterns include dots between two lines, often created with brass nails. The designs are influenced by Mughal-era geometry and Muslim architectural elements, with patterns formed by the interaction of circles and the use of a grid system.
Global Fashion is a place to Discover Indian Products including Handmade Ajrakh, Ethnic and Vintage products from India.
Amrozia and Ajrakh Studio - ©2023 Global Fashion. All Rights Reserved.
You can raise a request within 3 days to return your items by sending an email to support@amrozia.in by following the shipping and returns policy.
Can items be returned after the time period mentioned in Returns Policy?
No, we will not be able to accept returns after the time period mentioned in the Returns Policy.
Do I have to return the freebie when I return a product?
Yes, the freebie has to be returned along with the product.
What is the estimated delivery time?
We generally procure and ship the items within the time specified on the product page. Business days exclude public holidays and Sundays.
We will be sending an email with the details of the tracking number for you to be able to track your orders at all stages till the time it is delivered to you.

At Global Fashion, we have a no questions asked return policy. We ensure that our buyers have the best online shopping experience in a stress-free and free manner. We, therefore, offer “100% Buyer Protection Program” for our buyers. At the same time, we vow to be fair towards you.
What kinds of payment methods do you accept?

We offer you multiple payment methods. Whatever your online mode of payment, you can rest assured that our trusted payment gateway partners use secure encryption technology to keep your transaction details confidential at all times. You may use Internet Banking, Debit Card, Credit Card, and Cash on Delivery to make your purchase.
Who bears the Octroi for certain locations in India?
Nagpur, Sangli, Dombivili, Nasik, Mumbai, Pimpri Chinchwardi, Kothrud(Pune), Ahmednagar, Pune, Akola are Octroiable cities. Any applicable octroi will be payable by the customer.
You can\'t go wrong with a gift card. Choose an amount and write a personalized message to make this gift your own. Available to use in Ajrakh Shop.
